errors.message: The assignment to '{arg}' could not be resolved to a declaration in this or any containing scope.
The goto target '{arg}' could not be resolved to a label in this or any containing scope.
The string variable '{arg}' must have a length specifier.
The string variable '{arg}' must have a single valued length specifier.
The length for string '{arg}' must be a positive non-zero integer literal.
The option '{arg}' can only be applied to string declarations.
The type of '{arg}' does not support range attributes.
The precision for the variable '{arg}' must be a positive non-zero integer literal.
The scale for the variable '{arg}' must be an integer literal.
